# dimensions(faceSize:)

**Type Method**

Specifies the dimensions of the cube texture.

## Declaration

```swift
static func dimensions(faceSize: Int) -> TextureResource.DimensionsCube
```

## Discussion

The content specifies the number of mipmap levels.
title: dimensions(faceSize:)
